parameters.query:
WITH stats AS (
  SELECT
    group_id,
    -- 各状态计数
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE embedding_status = 'pending')    AS pending_only_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE embedding_status = 'failed')     AS failed_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE embedding_status = 'processing') AS processing_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE embedding_status = 'done')       AS done_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE embedding_status IS NULL)        AS null_count,

    -- 待处理总数（pending + failed）
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE embedding_status IN ('pending', 'failed')) AS pending_count,

    -- 最近一次 embedding 完成时间
    MAX(embedded_at) FILTER (WHERE embedding_status = 'done') AS last_embedded_at
  FROM chat_logs cl
  WHERE group_id = $1
    AND msg_id IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY group_id
)
SELECT
  group_id,
  pending_only_count,
  failed_count,
  processing_count,
  done_count,
  null_count,
  pending_count,
  last_embedded_at,
  CASE
    WHEN pending_count > 30
     AND processing_count = 0
    THEN true
    ELSE false
  END AS should_embed
FROM stats;

SELECT
    cl.id,
    cl.msg_id,
    cl.group_id,
    cl.sender_user_id,
    gm.card_name       AS card_name,
    gm.group_role      AS user_group_role,
    gm.special_title   AS user_special_title,
    u.user_inner_id    AS user_inner_id,
    u.nickname         AS user_nickname,
    u.is_bot           AS user_is_bot,
    cl.msg_type,
    cl.processed_text,
    cl.reply_to_msg_id,
    reply.processed_text   AS reply_text,
    reply_gm.card_name     AS reply_card_name,
    reply_gm.group_role    AS reply_group_role,
    reply_gm.special_title AS reply_special_title,
    reply_u.user_inner_id  AS reply_user_inner_id,
    reply_u.nickname       AS reply_nickname,
    reply_u.is_bot         AS reply_is_bot,
    cl.is_recalled,
    cl.recalled_by_user_id,
    cl.embedding_status,
    cl.is_inappropriate,
    cl.sent_at,
    sim.cosine_similarity
FROM (
    SELECT
        cle.chat_log_id,
        1 - (cle.embedding <=> ($1)::vector) AS cosine_similarity
    FROM chat_log_embeddings cle
    WHERE cle.group_id = $2
      AND 1 - (cle.embedding <=> ($1)::vector) >= $3
    ORDER BY cle.embedding <=> ($1)::vector
    LIMIT 10
) sim
JOIN chat_logs cl
  ON cl.id = sim.chat_log_id
LEFT JOIN chat_logs reply
  ON reply.msg_id = cl.reply_to_msg_id
LEFT JOIN group_members gm
  ON gm.group_id = cl.group_id
 AND gm.user_id  = cl.sender_user_id
LEFT JOIN users u
  ON u.user_id = cl.sender_user_id
LEFT JOIN group_members reply_gm
  ON reply_gm.group_id = cl.group_id
 AND reply_gm.user_id  = reply.sender_user_id
LEFT JOIN users reply_u
  ON reply_u.user_id = reply.sender_user_id
ORDER BY sim.cosine_similarity DESC;
